    • Method Detail

      • tiles

        public java.util.Set<Tile> tiles()
        Returns:
        A set of all of the Tiles in this Board.

      • pieces

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> pieces()
        Returns:
        A set of all of the pieces in this Board.

      • pieceToTile

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Tile> pieceToTile()
        Returns:
        A mapping of each piece in this Board to the Tile that the piece occupies. If a piece in this Board doesn't occupy a Tile, it will be mapped to a null value.

      • pieceOnTile

        public java.lang.Integer pieceOnTile(Tile tile)
        Parameters:
        tile - the Tile that the piece is on.
        Returns:
        the piece on tile. Returns null if there is no piece on tile.

      • tileForPiece

        public Tile tileForPiece(java.lang.Integer piece)
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to locate a Tile for.
        Returns:
        The Tile that piece is on. Returns null if the piece isn't on the board. (Note: the board might not have the piece. This is okay. If this is the case the board simply returns null, as the piece isn't on the board -- or off it, for that matter.)
